DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize clinical trial investigate efficacy different luteal phase support method patient poor ovarian response undergo IVF intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) cycle . The study protocol approve Ethics Committee ( Institutional Review Board ) Royan institute . The study conduct accord Declaration Helsinki medical research . All participant provide inform consent counsel infertility treatment routine IVF/ICSI program .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Different Luteal Phase Support Methods Patients With Poor Ovarian Response
DOC.detailed_description: All patient diagnose poor ovarian responder ( POR ) base Bologna criterion eligible participation study . In order define poor response IVF , least two follow three feature must present : ( ) advance maternal age risk factor POR ; ( ii ) previous POR ; ( iii ) abnormal ovarian reserve test ( ORT ) . Two episode POR maximal stimulation sufficient define patient poor responder absence advance maternal age abnormal ORT . The ovarian stimulation perform antagonist protocol E2 prim eligible patient . All woman receive estrogen priming ( E2 tablet ) start week LH surge menses . Controlled ovarian stimulation start day 2 menstrual cycle 225 IU recombinant FSH ( Gonal-F® ; Serono Laboratories Ltd. , Geneva , Switzerland ) 75 IU hMG ( Menopur® ; Ferring ) . The dos gonadotropin adjust ovarian response ultrasound monitoring . Gonadotropin release hormone ( GnRH ) antagonist ( Cetrorelix acetate 0.25 mg ; Cetrotide ® , USAN ) administrate prevent premature ovulation lead follicle measure ≥ 12 mm continue hCG trigger . Final oocyte trigger do 10000 IU hCG ( Choriomon® ; IBSA ) . If dominant follicle , oocytes retrieval do transvaginal ultrasound guidance 32-34 hour hCG administration . Intracytoplasmic sperm injection perform metaphase II oocyte . Embryo transfer do ultrasound guidance day 3 patient . On day oocyte pickup , patient allocate randomly ( blocked randomization method ) three group receive three different luteal support protocol remain allocation throughout study . Group 1 , subject receive 1,500 IU hCG IM embryo transfer ( ET ) day , well 4 day embryos transfer . Group 2 : patient receive 1,500 IU hCG IM ET day , well 3 6 day transfer along Endometrin ® vaginal tablet ( Ferring Pharmaceuticals Ltd. , Germany ) 100 mg twice daily . Group 3 , patient receive Endometrin ® vaginal tablet ( Ferring Pharmaceuticals Ltd. , Germany ) 100 mg twice daily luteal support day oocyte pickup day pregnancy test . The vaginal progesterone continue patient become pregnant three group 12th week pregnancy . The serum ß-hCG level check 2 week ET confirm positive pregnancy test . Clinical pregnancy detect confirmation positive fetal heart activity transvaginal sonography . The implantation rate consider proportion number observe intrauterine gestational sac number transfer embryos . Multiple pregnancy define two gestational sac uterine cavity . Miscarriage define loss clinical pregnancy 12th week gestation .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis poor ovarian response ( POR ) , accord Bologna criterion : patient least two follow criterion : age 40 year ; history ovarian surgery ; previous treatment use conventional protocol yield less three oocyte ; antral follicle count le 5 menstrual cycle day 23 ; basal serum FSH concentration 10 19 IU/l serum antiMüllerian hormone level le 1 ng/ml . 1 Female age 45 year old 2 Ovarian failure include basal FSH 20 IU/l antral follicle ultrasound examination 3 Severe male factor ( Azoospermia ) 4 Endometriosis diagnosis presence hydrosalpinges 5 Uterine factor ( polyp , myoma previous myomectomy , … ) 6 Patients cardiovascular disease and/or uncontrolled systemic endocrine diseases 7 Patients repeat implantation failure repeat miscarriage . 8 Female smoker
